Terms and Conditions

Welcome to Traveloways! These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using Traveloways, you agree to comply with and be bound by these terms. If you do not agree, please refrain from using our platform.

Use of the Website

  • You must be at least 18 years old to use Traveloways or have the consent of a legal guardian.
  • You agree to use the website for lawful purposes only and not to engage in any activity that disrupts or interferes with its functionality.
  • You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities under your account.

Bookings and Payments

  • All bookings (flights, hotels, activities, etc.) are subject to availability and the terms of the respective service providers.
  • Prices are dynamic and may change until the booking is confirmed.
  • Payment must be made in full at the time of booking, unless otherwise specified.
  • Traveloways acts as an intermediary and is not responsible for the services provided by third-party vendors (e.g., airlines and hotels).

Cancellations and Refunds

  • Cancellation and refund policies vary based on the service provider. Please review the specific terms before booking.
  • We will assist in processing cancellations and refunds as per the provider’s policies but cannot guarantee refunds unless explicitly stated.
  • Refunds, if applicable, may take up to 7 to 10 business days to process.

User Responsibilities

  • You are responsible for providing accurate and complete information during the booking process.
  • Ensure that your travel documents (e.g., passports, visas) are valid and comply with the requirements of your destination.
  • Traveloways is not liable for any issues arising from incorrect information provided by you.

Limitation of Liability

  • Traveloways is not liable for any losses, damages, or inconveniences caused by factors beyond our control, including but not limited to:
  • Acts of God, natural disasters, or weather conditions.
  • Political unrest, strikes, or other disruptions.
  • Errors or omissions by third-party service providers.
  • Our liability is limited to the total amount paid for the booking in question.

Intellectual Property

  • All content on the Traveloways website, including text, images, logos, and software, is the property of Traveloways or its licensors and is protected by copyright laws.
  • You may not reproduce, distribute, or use any content without prior written permission.

Privacy

Your use of Traveloways is subject to our Privacy Policy, which outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

Amendments

Traveloways reserves the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on the website. Your continued use of the platform constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

Traveloways operates as an autonomous third party site. Under no circumstances are we associated or partnered with any specific airline, hotel or travel service provider. Each information available on the website is for general use only and might not be accurate all the time. Therefore, you are advised to confirm all the travel details with the relevant service providers before making any booking.
